meanings.definition: Not closed or secured with a seal.
meanings.sent1: The unsealed envelope was easily opened.
meanings.sent2: The unsealed box had its contents exposed.
meanings.sent3: The unsealed bag of chips tempted the hungry dog.
meanings.sent4: Her unsealed heart revealed all its emotions.
meanings.sent5: The unsealed window let in a chilly breeze.

meanings.definition: To open or remove a seal from something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully unsealed the letter to read its contents.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist unsealed the ancient tomb with caution.
meanings.sent3: He unsealed the soda can and it sprayed everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The magician unsealed the locked box with a wave of his hand.
meanings.sent5: The detective unsealed the evidence bag to examine the clues inside.
